short_description: goa state horticultural corporation ltd. is a fruit & vegetable market based in tonca, india.
long_description: the goa state horticultural corporation is an government of goa undertaking with the main objectives to promote and undertake the cultivation of all types of horticultural and plantation crops. gshcl has emerged as one of the top government institution to supply fresh vegetables and fruits to public of goa through gshcl vendors also giving an employment opportunity for goans. the goa state horticulture ltd is committed to deliver fruits, vegetables and grocery to the goan population and also to give a boost to local farming and provide employment to the people. with this beginning we hope to bring about change in the system with an aim to make our service system more productive, efficient, transparent and more over highly accessible.

generated_description: goa state horticultural corporation ltd, also known as gshcl, is a government institution established by the government of goa with the aim of promoting and cultivating all types of horticultural and plantation crops. the corporation has emerged as a leading supplier of fresh vegetables and fruits to the public of goan through its vendors, providing employment opportunities for the people of goans. in order to break the monopoly of local vendors, gshl started supplying fresh vegetables to the people from four outlets located at panaji market, althino, tonca, and verna idc. the company is committed to delivering fruits, vegetables, and groceries to the goan population while also supporting local farming and providing employment to the community. the production and marketing of harticultural crops is facing continuous change globally due to the growing demand for safe and healthy foods and increased urbanization of societies.
